sentences.en: Alex was almost speechless with rage and despair.
sentences.cn: 亚历克斯又生气又绝望，几乎说不出话来。

sentences.en: Dave stood there, speechless with fury , as Clarence strode off, triumphant.
sentences.cn: 戴夫站在那里, 气得说不出话来.克拉伦斯却迈着大步, 得意洋洋地走开了.

sentences.en: For a long while he remained speechless.
He kept a straight face and remained speechless.
He was almost speechless with anger.
sentences.cn: 他气得几乎说不出话来.

sentences.en: I was speechless, still trying to assimilate the enormity of what he'd told me.
sentences.cn: 我无话可说，一时还无法接受他对我所说之事的严重性。

sentences.en: Mr. Lin's heart gave a leap. He stood stock - still and glared, speechless.
sentences.cn: 林先生心里蓦地一跳, 站住了睁大着眼睛, 说不出话.

sentences.en: Speechless with ecstasy , the little boys gazed at the toys.
sentences.cn: 小孩注视着那些玩具,高兴得说不出话来.

sentences.en: The bad news rendered us all speechless from shock.
sentences.cn: 这个坏消息使大家惊愕得说不出话来.

sentences.en: The Chief was left speechless by this fatuous remark.
sentences.cn: 这句傻话让主任一时说不出话来。

sentences.en: The leaders of the Kopper Company were then stunned speechless.
sentences.cn: 科伯公司的领导们当时被惊得目瞪口呆.

sentences.en: The little boy was speechless with shock.
sentences.cn: 那小男孩惊得说不出话来。

sentences.en: The shock of the discovery rendered him speechless.
sentences.cn: 这一发现使他吃惊得一句话也说不出来.

sentences.en: The three of them just gaped at him, speechless.
sentences.cn: 吴为成他们三个愣着眼睛, 做不得声.
